targets.expr: sum(rate(nginx_filterzone_responses_total:controller{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", scheme=~"$scheme", server_zone="request_time_hist", key=~"0\\..*|1\\..*"}[$__interval_rv])) by (key) > 0

sum(rate(nginx_filterzone_responses_total:controller{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", scheme=~"$scheme", server_zone="request_time_hist", key=~"[2-9]"}[$__interval_rv])) by (key) > 0

sum(rate(nginx_filterzone_responses_total:controller{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", scheme=~"$scheme", server_zone="request_time_hist", key=~"10|>10"}[$__interval_rv])) by (key) > 0

sum(rate(nginx_filterzone_responses_total:controller{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", scheme=~"$scheme", instance=~"$instance", server_zone="upstream_response_time_hist", key=~"0\\..*|1\\..*"}[$__interval_rv])) by (key) > 0

sum(rate(nginx_filterzone_responses_total:controller{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", scheme=~"$scheme", instance=~"$instance", server_zone="upstream_response_time_hist", key=~"[2-9]"}[$__interval_rv])) by (key) > 0

sum(rate(nginx_filterzone_responses_total:controller{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", scheme=~"$scheme", instance=~"$instance", server_zone="upstream_response_time_hist", key=~"10|>10"}[$__interval_rv])) by (key) > 0

sum(rate(nginx_filterzone_responses_total:controller{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", scheme=~"$scheme", instance=~"$instance", server_zone="request_time_hist", key=~"0\\..*|1\\..*"}[$__interval_rv])) by (key) > 0

sum(rate(nginx_filterzone_responses_total:controller{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", scheme=~"$scheme", instance=~"$instance", server_zone="request_time_hist", key=~"[2-9]"}[$__interval_rv])) by (key) > 0

sum(rate(nginx_filterzone_responses_total:controller{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", scheme=~"$scheme", instance=~"$instance", server_zone="request_time_hist", key=~"10|>10"}[$__interval_rv])) by (key) > 0

sum(increase(nginx_requests_total:controller{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", instance=~"$instance", scheme="https"}[$__interval_rv])) / (sum(increase(nginx_requests_total:controller{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", instance=~"$instance", }[$__interval_rv])) > 0)

sum(rate(nginx_responses_total:controller{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", instance=~"$instance", scheme=~"$scheme", status_code=~"1xx|2xx"}[$__interval_rv])) by (namespace) > 0

sum(rate(nginx_responses_total:controller{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", instance=~"$instance", scheme=~"$scheme", status_code="3xx"}[$__interval_rv])) by (namespace) > 0

sum(rate(nginx_responses_total:controller{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", instance=~"$instance", scheme=~"$scheme", status_code="4xx"}[$__interval_rv])) by (namespace) > 0

sum(rate(nginx_responses_total:controller{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", instance=~"$instance", scheme=~"$scheme", status_code="5xx"}[$__interval_rv])) by (namespace) > 0

sum(rate(nginx_bytes_total:controller{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", scheme=~"$scheme", instance=~"$instance", direction="out"}[$__interval_rv])) by (namespace) * 8 > 0

sum(rate(nginx_bytes_total:controller{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", scheme=~"$scheme", instance=~"$instance", direction="out"}[$__interval_rv])) by (namespace) * 8 > 0
